\begin{split}\displaystyle|\Psi\rangle&\displaystyle=\sum_{i}\alpha_{i}|\phi_{% i}\rangle_{A}|\Phi_{i}\rangle_{BC}\\ &\displaystyle=\sum_{i}\beta_{i}|\theta_{i}\rangle_{B}|\Theta_{i}\rangle_{AC}% \\ &\displaystyle=\sum_{i}\gamma_{i}|\chi_{i}\rangle_{C}|X_{i}\rangle_{AB}\end{split}

\begin{split}\displaystyle\alpha_{1}^{4}+\alpha_{2}^{4}&\displaystyle=% \operatorname{tr}(\rho_{A}^{2})=I_{2},\\ \displaystyle\beta_{1}^{4}+\beta_{2}^{4}&\displaystyle=\operatorname{tr}(\rho_% {B}^{2})=I_{3},\\ \displaystyle\gamma_{1}^{4}+\gamma_{2}^{4}&\displaystyle=\operatorname{tr}(% \rho_{C}^{2})=I_{4}.\end{split}

\begin{split}\displaystyle\rho_{A}&\displaystyle=\sum_{i}\alpha_{i}^{2}|\phi_{% i}\rangle\langle\phi_{i}|,\\ \displaystyle\rho_{B}&\displaystyle=\sum_{i}\beta_{i}^{2}|\theta_{i}\rangle% \langle\theta_{i}|,\\ \displaystyle\rho_{C}&\displaystyle=\sum_{i}\gamma_{i}^{2}|\chi_{i}\rangle% \langle\chi_{i}|.\end{split}

\begin{split}\displaystyle\sum_{jk}c^{ijk}\overline{c}_{ljk}&\displaystyle=% \alpha_{i}^{2}\delta^{i}_{l},\\ \displaystyle\sum_{ik}c^{ijk}\overline{c}_{imk}&\displaystyle=\beta_{j}^{2}% \delta^{j}_{m},\\ \displaystyle\sum_{ij}c^{ijk}\overline{c}_{ijn}&\displaystyle=\gamma_{k}^{2}% \delta^{k}_{n}.\end{split}

c^{ijk}=\langle\phi_{i}|_{A}\langle\theta_{j}|_{B}\langle\chi_{k}|_{C}|\Psi% \rangle=\gamma_{k}\langle\phi_{i}|_{A}\langle\theta_{j}|_{B}|X_{k}\rangle_{AB}.
